class_notes: Online Asynchronous with a synchronous Zoom session: 8/30 at 7:30pm. On-campus intensive dates: 9/20-9/22 and 11/15-16.
course_description: Course focuses on independent & collaborative function/decision-making within the healthcare team to provide comprehensive acute/critical/chronic care for neonates and older infants up to age 2. Emphasis is on critical and chronic care, transitions of care and multiple- patient caseload management.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3127, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: T. Bell, Status: Closed
